properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 29 at 3:18PM AKST until January 30 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the first Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow.
Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch near White Pass.
Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. For the second Winter Storm
Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8
inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph during the afternoon
hours on Thursday when the wind switches to the south.

* WHERE...Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway including Skagway and
White Pass.

* WHEN...For the first Winter Storm Warning, until 6 PM AKST
this evening. For the second Winter Storm Warning, from 3 AM
to 9 PM AKST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of
blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds
could bring down trees and powerlines. Near blizzard conditions
are possible near White Pass in the afternoon and early evening
hours.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING AROUND FOR WHITE PASS... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 PM AKST THURSDAY
